arrowFunction.description: Boilerplate syntax for an arrow function

arrowFunctionReturningObject.description: Boilerplate syntax for an anonymous function that returns an object

singleLineArrowFunction.description: Boilerplate syntax for an single line anonymous function

fetch.description: Inserts code needed to make a request with fetch

reduceWithFunction.description: Inserts a reduce function call with a function body

reduceWithObject.description: Inserts a reduce function call with a function body

regexMatchAll.description: Inserts array of matches from expanded matchAll function including capture groups

unique.description: Inserts filter, indexOf, calls to unique an array
